name: Base Styles
description:
Base Styles is your brand library.

Manage and access all your brand assets in one central place. It will keep your branding consistent, clear and unified!


Plugin for Figma

With the Figma plugin for Base Styles, you can easily import your brand assets into your Figma designs.


Getting started

  1. Sign up for Base Styles
  2. Create your brand library by adding your brand assets in Base Styles
  3. Install this Figma Plugin and enter your API key to connect to your brand library.


Support

For support or questions, email us at support@basestyles.com
